dct_description_sm: Later reproduction, [unknown date], with Amstelodami, Excusum apud Iudocum et Henricum Hondium. Anno 1631. with text of manuscript appearance. Without 'I. de Ceintas' below 'I.S. Marco' off west coast of California, with changed ship and sea monster vignettes and with compass rose below Bermuda. Falsely attributed to Judocum and Henry Hondius, but of unknown origin.

California of Briggs type, with nearly flat northern coast. C. Blanco is point furthest north. Includes I. de Ceintas off west coast of California. Title cartouche (upper left) flanked by standing natives. Reissued many times, with Latin, French, German, Dutch and Spanish texts.
